'''''Fluorescent Bloom''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Sumeru: The Rainforest of Lore]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to upgrade the [[Statues of The Seven]] in [[Sumeru]] to their maximum level.

== Trivia ==
The Chinese name references a quote from ''The Eulogy to Master Daosheng of Longguang Temple'', a work written by Monk Huilin of Southern Song Dynasty to commemorate the life of Buddhist scholar {{W|Daosheng}}: {{Zh|tx=如草芝兰，如玉之瑾。匪粤薰琢，成此芳绚。|lit=Like orchid among grass, like fine jade among jades. It was through refinement that they became fragrant and brilliant as they are.}}
